rules_text:
{2}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Decompose into Clue {4}{U} [i]({4}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a colorless Clue artifact with no mana cost and “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card,” and it loses all other card types. Decompose only as a sorcery.)[/i]
